project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a provided CSV file, calculating the mean, median, and mode for specified numerical columns.

task.name: Implement functionality to read CSV file
Implement function to calculate mean for specified columns
Implement function to calculate median for specified columns
Implement function to calculate mode for specified columns
Write tests for each of the functions implemented above
Execute tests on all implemented functions to ensure that they function correctly
